title: Unable to connect to chat
body:
I cant see the friend list , chats , notifications(game invites,friend requests,etc) , champion select chat and even my actual summoner icon 

I have tried a lot of stuff including the HRT , reinstalling  and repairing 

I tried changing between the beta client and the legacy and didnt work in any client 

I dont know what to do to fix this

replies.body: Your friend list and chat all run on a slightly different platform, so it sounds like your network might be having a hard time reaching those servers to grab the data it needs to display. Let's be sure to check all the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure nothing is blocking your network from communicating with our servers. Hit me back up if you're still not seeing your chats and such!

Hello Bro

I tried everything in the connection guide and still got no results , I even try to put my local ip through DMZ , did  all the steps on the guide and didnt work  , I noticed that even the Lolchat app cant connect correctly I also found that when I connect to another network it works but I dont know whats wrong in mine It seems like its working fine I even have a 60ms ping ingame which is normal , it is the only game that it seems to have problems to connect to the chat / friend list .

I also found that when im playing I cant see pings from my team mates I only can see mine dont know what else to do I know it must be my network  but it was working normal like 2 days ago now . 

I dont know what else to check.

thx again for your reply

Hmmmmm there must be a setting somewhere that's throwing off your connection to the chat servers specifically. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can take a much deeper look with you one on one!
